column1: Little Goat Diner////We had a great meal at The Little Goat. The specials were awesome. Our server
column3: comical and interactive. Her real name is Megan though. Worth asking for if she's working. I'm a very picky eater
column4: and she got me to try the "Sloppy Goat!" I can't believe I ate goat
column5: but it was extremely delicious. Definitely a place to check out in Chicago.
